message.name: ERR_EMPLOYMENT_DRE_SEARCH
message.locale: This person is already employed by this employer at this time.

message.name: ERR_EMPLOYMENT_FV_DATE_PASSED
message.locale: The end date of primary employment has passed.

message.name: ERR_EMPLOYMENT_XRV_PRIMARYEMPLOYMENT_CANCEL_FAILURE
message.locale: You cannot delete the primary employment. Please create another employment and assign it as the primary employment before attempting to delete this employment.

message.name: ERR_EMPLOYMENT_XRE_PRIMARY_ENDDATE
message.locale: End date on the primary employment must not be earlier than today.

message.name: ERR_EMPLOYMENT_FV_PRIMARY_NOTSET
message.locale: You cannot modify the primary employment so that it's no longer primary. Please select another employment and make it the primary.

message.name: ERR_EMPLOYMENT_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_CREATE
message.locale: New employment details cannot be added for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate.

message.name: ERR_EMPLOYMENT_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_MODIFY
message.locale: Employment details of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_EMPLOYMENT_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Employment details for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.
